str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Four thousand. From the multiplicative adverb of tessares and chilioi; four times a thousand.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
Neuter diminutive of pais; a childling, i.e., an infant, or a half-grown boy or girl; figuratively, an immature Christian.
